DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics AZD8683 follow single ascend dose administration healthy male subject .
DOC.criteria: Provision sign , write date informed consent prior study specific procedure Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 weigh least 50 kg 100 kg Be nonsmoker exsmoker stop smoke ( use nicotine product ) > 6 month prior study start Any clinically significant disease disorder Any clinically significant abnormality screen examination Use prescribe nonprescribed medication
